window.name: Component Overview
window.help: Component Overview: List of equipped components. Double click to activate (weapons need you to have things targeted). Yellow text means activated, blue means some in the stack are activated, but not all.

window.name: Inventory
window.help: Inventory: List of things in the inventories of the selected ships. Double click to use/equip, right click to drop (Z loots, in case you drop something nice).
